column4: Need some help... I'm running Hardy and I can't open anything as root. Like sudo nautilus. It just hangs, so what's going on?
did you happen to create a root login at one point?
you don't still have the cd in the drive do you?
have you done all your updates?
very weird.. outside of suggesting a reboot that probably won't do anything.. I"m at a loss.
Rebooted way to many times already :(
what are you using nautilus for at root?
So I can replace some files for Gimp
replace? are they newer/older or just missing?
Neither :P I'm replacing the splash image for my friend
have you tried from the terminal? sudo cp <path to file> <path to new location>
But I'd like to know why I can't open anything as root :P
someone else will have to take up the banner on this one.. at least sudo works.
